code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import'./ChampionProfile.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChampionProfile=_ref=>{let{champion}=_ref;if(!champion){return null;}const{name,link,image}=champion;const fighterUrlName=link.split('/').pop();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/fighter/".concat(fighterUrlName),className:"champion-profile",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"champion-image-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,alt:name,className:"champion-image"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"champion-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"champion-name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"champion-title",children:"Champion"})]})]});};export default ChampionProfile;
